bug.author: SoloSynth1
bug.description:
System information
TensorFlow version: N/A Doc Link: https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image
Describe the documentation issue On the page <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/image</denchmark-link>
The link within the text "See the Images guide." is broken. (It is currently directing to <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_guides/python/image>https://www.tensorflow.org/api_guides/python/image</denchmark-link> , but 404'd) edit: Removed contents from template unrelated to the issue.

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/SoloSynth1>@SoloSynth1</denchmark-link> I had accessed the page provided, it says 404 error. We will take a look. Thanks for bringing this to our notice.

First two links are not working as shown in the <denchmark-link:https://screenshot.googleplex.com/Tv3SBDNQrmU>screenshot</denchmark-link> . First link that is not working (bold_italic): Defined in tensorflow/_api/v1/image/ Second link that is not working (bold_italic): See the guide . Thanks!

I can add an updated API guide similar to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/r1.11/site/en/api_guides/python/image.md>image.md</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/muddham>@muddham</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jvishnuvardhan>@jvishnuvardhan</denchmark-link> please share your views. Thank you

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/vijayphoenix>@vijayphoenix</denchmark-link>
We don't have an api-gides section anymore, but if you want to add that information back to the <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/image_ops.py>docstring of the tf.image module</denchmark-link> , that could be good. If you take this on, remember that the generated page includes a list of all the symbols in the module. also remember that if you include example code, please use <denchmark-link:https://docs.python.org/3/library/doctest.html>doctest format</denchmark-link> , so the example gets tested.
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/MarkDaoust>@MarkDaoust</denchmark-link> , I will do the necessary changes and make a PR. Thank you for your input.

Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/MarkDaoust>@MarkDaoust</denchmark-link> , I made a PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/37171>#37171</denchmark-link> addressing this issue. Please take a look. Thank you
